text: Karl Otto Götz (February 22, 1914 - August 19, 2017) was a German artist. He was best known for his many abstract paintings in the Informel, or art without form, style. Götz was born in Aachen, GermanyObvious website, "Karl Otto Götz", 4 February 2007 , accessed 7 February 2011 and died in Niederbreitbach. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German centenarians Category:German painters Category:People from Aachen
title: Karl Otto Götz
